edu.utsa.mobbed
Class ManageDB

Object
  ManageDB

public class ManageDB
extends Object

A handler to a MOBBED database. This handler can be used to update, insert, and query the database.

Author:
Arif Hossain, Jeremy Cockfield, Kay Robbins

ManageDB

public ManageDB(String dbname,
                String hostname,
                String username,
                String password,
                boolean verbose)
         throws MobbedException
Creates a ManageDB object.

Parameters:
dbname - the name of the database
hostname - the host name of the database
username - the user name of the database
password - the password of the database
verbose - prints informative messages if true
Throws:
MobbedException - if an error occurs
Method Detail

addRows

public String[] addRows(String tableName,
                        String[] columnNames,
                        String[][] columnValues,
                        String[] doubleColumnNames,
                        Double[][] doubleValues)
                 throws MobbedException
Inserts or updates rows in the database. To insert rows, do not assign values to the key columns. To update rows, assign values to the key columns that already exist in the database.

Parameters:
tableName - the name of the database table
columnNames - the names of the columns in the database table
columnValues - the values of the columns that are not double precision in the database table
doubleColumnNames - the names of the columns that are double precision in the database table
doubleValues - the values of the columns that are double precision in the database table
Returns:
the keys of the rows that were inserted or updated
Throws:
MobbedException - if an error occurs

checkDatasetVersion

public int checkDatasetVersion(boolean isUnique,
                               String datasetNamespace,
                               String datasetName)
                        throws MobbedException
Checks the dataset namespace and name combination. If isUnique is set to true and the combination already exist then an exception will be thrown. If isUnique is false and the combination already exist then the dataset version will be incremented signifying a duplicate dataset.

Parameters:
isUnique - if the dataset namespace and name combination is unique combination
datasetName - the name of the dataset
datasetNamespace - the namespace of the dataset
Returns:
the version number of the dataset
Throws:
MobbedException - if an error occurs

           throws MobbedException
Closes a database connection.

MobbedException - if an error occurs

            throws MobbedException

extractRows

public String[][] extractRows(String inTableName,
                              String[] inColumnNames,
                              String[][] inColumnValues,
                              String outTableName,
                              String[] outColumnNames,
                              String[][] outColumnValues,
                              double limit,
                              String regExp,
                              double lower,
                              double upper)
                       throws MobbedException
Retrieve inter-related items such as events from more complex scenarios.

Parameters:
inTableName - the name of the database table
inColumnNames - the names of the columns
inColumnValues - the values of the columns
outTableName - the name of the database table
outColumnNames - the names of the columns
outColumnValues - the values of the columns
limit - the maximum number of rows to return
regExp - on if regular expressions are allowed, off if otherwise
lower - the lower limit
upper - the upper limit
Returns:
the row retrieved from the search
Throws:
MobbedException - if an error occurs

extractUniqueRows

public String[][] extractUniqueRows(String[][] extractedRows,
                                    int limit)
                             throws MobbedException
Retrieve unique inter-related items such as events from more complex scenarios.

Parameters:
extractedRows - the rows that were previously extracted
limit - the maximum number of rows to return
Returns:
the unique rows returned by the search
Throws:
MobbedException - if an error occurs

retrieveRows

public String[][] retrieveRows(String tableName,
                               double limit,
                               String regExp,
                               String[][] tags,
                               String[][] attributes,
                               String[] columnNames,
                               String[][] columnValues)
                        throws MobbedException
Retrieves rows from a table based on search criteria.

Parameters:
tableName - the name of the database table
limit - the maximum number of rows to return
regExp - on if regular expressions are allowed, off if otherwise
tags - the tags search criteria
attributes - the attributes search criteria
columnNames - the name of the database columns
columnValues - the values of the columns
Returns:
the rows that were found based on the search criteria
Throws:
MobbedException - if an error occurs

createCredentials

public static void createCredentials(String filename,
                                     String dbname,
                                     String hostname,
                                     String username,
                                     String password)
                              throws MobbedException
Stores the database credentials in a property file. Call loadCredentials to get the database credentials back.

Parameters:
filename - the filename of the property file
dbname - the name of the database
hostname - the host name of the database
username - the user name of the database
password - the password of the database
Throws:
MobbedException - if an error occurs

createDatabase

public static void createDatabase(String dbname,
                                  String hostname,
                                  String username,
                                  String password,
                                  String filename,
                                  boolean verbose)
                           throws MobbedException
Creates and populates a database. The database must not already exist to create it. The database will be created from a valid SQL file.

Parameters:
dbname - the name of the database
hostname - the host name of the database
username - the user name of the database
password - the password of the database
filename - the name of the sql file
verbose - prints informative messages if true
Throws:
MobbedException - if an error occurs

deleteDatabase

public static void deleteDatabase(String dbname,
                                  String hostname,
                                  String username,
                                  String password,
                                  boolean verbose)
                           throws MobbedException
Deletes the database and all objects associated with oids. The database must already exist to delete it. There must be no active connections to delete the database.

Parameters:
dbname - the name of the database
hostname - the host name of the database
username - the user name of the database
password - the password of the database
verbose - prints informative messages if true
Throws:
MobbedException - if an error occurs

executeSQL

public static void executeSQL(Connection dbCon,
                              String statement)
                       throws MobbedException
Executes a SQL statement. The sql statement must be valid or an exception will be thrown.

Parameters:
dbCon - a connection to the database
statement - the sql statement to be executed
Throws:
MobbedException - if an error occurs

loadCredentials

public static String[] loadCredentials(String filename)
                                throws Exception
Loads the database credentials from a property file. The credentials will be stored in a array.

Parameters:
filename - the name of the property file
Returns:
an array that contains the database credentials
Throws:
MobbedException - if an error occurs
Exception
